channel.title: Save when you dc?
channel.description:
Well everytime it dc's it doesnt save.
I was wondering how to fix this bug please.
Its been pissing me off lately lol.
~fishys

Hmm, it still doesnt work :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 02:10:53 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help please?

item.title: Save when you dc?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

In client.java find

smitimer -= 1;

And replace ya code with

smitimer -= 1; if(smitimer <= 1) { savechar(); //println_debug("Saved Character : "+playerName); savemoreinfo(); savecharbackup(); //println_debug("Now saving the MoreInfo"); if(savemoreinfo()) { //println_debug("Saving is done !"); attempts = 0; smitimer = 180; } else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5) { //println_debug("Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds"); //println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts); attempts += 1; smitimer = 180; } else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5) { //println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts+" - Giving up saving moreinfo file!"); attempts += 1; smitimer = 14000000; } }

Read full topic
